name: The Floramancer's Trial
description:
Made between May 26-31 2021 for the Go Godot Jam 2021 with a theme of growth. Play minigames to help the floramancer's apprentice grow the best staff possible to start their floramancy journey! Feedback and bug reports welcome

Google Chrome not recommended. May cause issues in Rune mini-game.

Gameplay time estimated from 20-30 minutes

Art by Jeanette Wagner

Code by Thomas Murphy
